alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 11:48AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central St. Louis and northeastern Carlton Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1148 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, or 14 miles northwest of Cloquet, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brookston around 1205 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cloquet, Scanlon, Carlton, Thomson, Saginaw and Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
